This calculator is using equations as specifed in publicly available American Wood Council resources. 

Any miscalculations or false values we are not responsible for. We retain no liability for anything that goes wrong as result of any miscalulations from this app.

Everything is completed to the best of our abilities but there may be errors. Please double check calculations before repeatedly using a feature.

 All code is publicly available on Github @GabrielSolomonHolland. If you spot a miscalculation, have a question, or if we are mistaken about copyright, please let us know at gabrielsolomonholland@gmail.com
